wikipedia_page.main: Robert Ferguson (c. 1846 – 19 May 1915), was a Scottish professional golfer who was one of the top players from the mid-1860s into the 1880s. He won a hat-trick of consecutive titles at The Open Championship in 1880, 1881 and 1882.In addition to the three Open Championship wins, he posted top-10 finishes seven times.
